name: Lineage II Replay File
summary: An L2R file is a replay file created by Lineage II, a fantasy massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) for Windows. It contains a replay of Lineage II gameplay, such as a fortress siege or open field battle. L2R files do not store actual video, instead, they store a set of instructions read by the game to replay the action.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
